name: wingback
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an armchair (= a comfortable chair with sides that support your arms) that has a high back from which large side pieces stick out at the top: She settled into a big leather wingback in the spacious lounge. There was a cosy wingback chair I could curl up in and read a book. Synonyms
wing chair
wing-backed chair
another spelling of
wing back
More examplesFewer examplesThe wing chair, or wingback as it is also known, is a classic in interior design.A pair of good wingback chairs made nearly £200 at the sale.They sat in matching wingback chairs, and shared a single light between them.
